resources.string: Please find and Open it
Please find float and Open it
You should open the notification permission！
Notification access
I grant
Please click Floating window management, find and enable it
Please click Manage autorun apps, find and enable it
Please find and activate floating window or pop-up notification
Enable Auto launch

If Floating button is not shown, please do as following: 

1:Open phone Settings->Apps->%s->Permission management, enable pop-up window. 

2:Find system app, such as Security or smart manager, open Permission, enable pop-up window. 

3:Search how to open pop-up window in your phone on the internet.
Grant failed
To prevent Touch Master being stopped, please find me, press and pull down to lock it.
To prevent Touch Master being stopped, please find me and lock it.
Please click Autostart, find and enable me
Please enable Trusted app and Auto launch to ensure stable running.
Please click RAM, AUTO RUN APPS, find Touch Master and enable it.
The feature needs permission, please grant it.\n\n · %s
Draw over other apps
Close
Please find and open %s。
